scenario_text.value:
Pull yourself together, Kaito. Snap out of
it!

*huff* *huff*... Awesome, we got him outta
that delusion.
So you saw a vision too, huh?

She told me her big brother couldn’t protect
her.
I know. Someone’s messing with me.

I won’t forgive anyone taking her shape. Not
a freakin’ chance!
You gonna look for the others?

Yeah, uh, that was the plan. If you’re worn
out, you can take a break here.
Naw, I’ll go. You good, Dracumon?
You know it. I’m pretty peeved off myself.
Let’s go. We’ll help out if there’s a fight.

(Kaito... Is he okay? I hope he doesn’t push
himself too hard.)
